sentences.en: After school, I had picked up Nick and Ted and made the rounds of the dry cleaner and the grocery store.
sentences.cn: 放学以后，我接了尼克和特德，然后又去了干洗店和杂货店。

sentences.en: Grocery stores have to offer enough specials to bring people into the store.
sentences.cn: 杂货店为了招揽顾客不得不推出多种特色产品。

sentences.en: Grocery stores sell many foods that have been processed.
sentences.cn: 食品杂货店出售多种加工食品.

sentences.en: He is in the grocery way.
He was employed at the local grocery store as a delivery boy.
sentences.cn: 他受雇于当地杂货店当送货员.

sentences.en: Her mother began operation of a small grocery.
sentences.cn: 她母亲开始经营一家小杂货店.

sentences.en: I don't really want to go to the grocery store but I'll go along for the ride.
sentences.cn: 我不是真的要去杂货店,而是去兜风.

sentences.en: I worked stocking shelves in a grocery store.
sentences.cn: 我在一家杂货店工作，负责为货架上货。

sentences.en: It is difficult for a small grocery store to compete with a supermarket.
sentences.cn: 小商店很难与超市抗争.

sentences.en: One of my grocery bags was still precariously perched on the car bumper.
sentences.cn: 我的一只食品杂货物袋还摇摇欲坠地搭在汽车保险杠上。

sentences.en: One was to go to the butcher, another to the grocery.
sentences.cn: 一次是去肉铺, 另一次是去杂货店.

sentences.en: The company, which makes its money on 3,000 grocery lines has its knickers in a twist about Sunday trading.
sentences.cn: 这家依靠3,000种食品杂货盈利的公司为其星期天的营业状况烦恼。

sentences.en: The grocery is closed up for the night; we'll have to come back tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 杂货店晚上不营业, 我们只好明天再来.

sentences.en: The hunter came into a grocery and told his story.
sentences.cn: 猎人走进一家食品店,讲述了这件事.

sentences.en: There hangs straight on the wall of this grocery a service pledge.
sentences.cn: 这家副食店在墙上端端正正挂着一张服务公约.

sentences.en: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.cn: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

trans.tran_en: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket
